sentences.sContent: I’m suffering from jet lag but I’ll feel better after a good night’s sleep.
sentences.sCn: 我时差反应很厉害，但好好睡上一夜就会感觉好些的。

trans.tranOther: the tired and confused feeling that you can get after flying a very long distance, especially because of the difference in time between the place you left and the place you arrived at
